definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: Oxy-hydrogen flame can replace other flames for cutting billet.
sentences.chinese: 完全可以代替其它燃气用于连铸坯切割。

sentences.english: The displayed models use 500 ccm ATV Motor which are already mass produced.
sentences.chinese: 展出的汽车模型，用500连铸亚视目前已批量生产。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the stopper auto control system of Conti.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了炼钢厂连铸生产中的塞棒自动控制系统。

sentences.english: This paper mainly introduces the application of magnesia coating in tundish for CSP caster.
sentences.chinese: 介绍镁质喷涂料在CSP连铸中间罐上的应用。

sentences.english: Continuous casting low-temperature molten steel, micro-electricity of micro-micro-particle, and casting blank speeding-up and normal pouring.
sentences.chinese: 连铸低温钢水，微微粒子的微电，铸坯提速正常浇制。

sentences.english: Breakout prediction system (BOPS) is a key technical equipment of high efficient continuous casting technique.
sentences.chinese: 漏钢预报系统属于高效连铸生产的关键工艺和装备。

sentences.english: EUROSTRIP ○R direct strip production technology is steadily consolidating its advanced position in strip casting.
sentences.chinese: 技术在带钢连铸生产领域稳居领先地位。

sentences.english: The electromagnetic soft-contact continuous casting(EMCC) technique is a novel technique.
sentences.chinese: 电磁软接触连铸技术是一门新兴技术。

sentences.english: The paper introduces servo drive technology applied in Horizontal Continuous Casting System.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了伺服驱动技术在水平连铸中的应用。

sentences.english: Slab arc Al wire marking machine is specially designed for slab marking.
sentences.chinese: 连铸板坯电弧铝丝喷号机是铸坯喷号的专用设备。

sentences.english: Some longitudinal cracks on the surface of the continuous cast slab SS400 were detected.
sentences.chinese: 连铸板坯SS400生产检验中出现表面纵裂缺陷。

sentences.english: The technical features of 100t converter and wide and heavy continuous casting slab system were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍柳钢100吨转炉及宽厚板坯连铸系统技术特点。

sentences.english: Schedule rules for two-strand thin slab casting and rolling were established.
sentences.chinese: 首先建立了两流薄板坯连铸连轧流程生产调度规则库。

sentences.english: Optimizing the section size and chosing the nearest shape are the development direction of continuous casting.
sentences.chinese: 指出优化截面尺寸，选择近终形截面连铸是发展方向。

sentences.english: Development of thin slab and thin billet casting technology in China are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 同时介绍了中国发展连铸薄板坯及细小方坯的情况。

sentences.english: The protective dregs of the continuous casting crystallizer appreciably affect the quality of the casting block surface.
sentences.chinese: 连铸结晶器保护渣对铸坯表面质量具有显著影响。

definition: to roll steel (into sheets or bars)
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
to straighten/(fig.) to mend one's ways
